name: image-collage-maker
title: Image Collage Maker
description: Combine 2-4 images into a 2x2 grid collage
content:
Overview

This application combines 2-4 images into a beautiful 2x2 grid collage. Built using Pillow, it automatically resizes and centers images while maintaining their aspect ratios.

Features

  • Create 2x2 grid collages with 2-4 images
  • Automatic aspect ratio preservation
  • Images centered in each cell
  • High-quality LANCZOS resampling
  • White background for empty cells

Parameters

  • Image 1-4: Upload 2-4 images from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a collage image named collage_2x2_[count]_images.jpg with each cell sized at 800x800 pixels (total 1600x1600).

Use Cases

  • Creating photo collages for social media
  • Building comparison grids
  • Combining product photos
  • Making visual summaries
  • Creating mood boards
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python "prod_apps/python/image_collage_maker.py" "${image1}" "${image2}" "${image3}" "${image4}" -o "${outputDir}" -s 800
